org.jsmpp.util
Class PDUByteBuffer

java.lang.Object
  org.jsmpp.util.PDUByteBuffer

public class PDUByteBuffer
extends java.lang.Object

Utility to compose the PDU bytes. The size of the buffer is depends to the entities appended to the buffer.

Since:
1.0
Version:
1.0
Author:
uudashr
